name: LegalMarketingMinutes
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Legal Marketing Minutes contains short bursts of marketing, business development, content, social and digital media advice for lawyers and legal marketers. Your host, Nancy Myrland, is President of Myrland Marketing & Social Media and Founder of The Lawyer's Marketing Academy, an online course site for lawyers. 
Blog: www.myrlandmarketing.com
Academy: www.thelawyersmarketingacademy.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
